==Description 
Select Request Verification from the Project menu. In the dialog, one user is selected. When you click on the "Don't block check-ins" checkbox, the user is unselected, and when you click OK there is no action or error message.
* The user should not be unselected
* If no user is selected, clicking OK should display a message box "Please select a project member".
